recommendations: harsh sharma “Kriti joined our team as a graduate and since then she has been inquisitive to learn new tech stacks. She has worked on java adapters, Shell Scripting and GCP side of architecture. On process aspect of things she has demonstrated good understanding. She is a motivated individual and a great team player.”

Srinivas Cheruku “I had the opportunity to mentor Kriti when she joined our Team. Kriti is very keen on learning new things, always seeking & never tiring! She enthusiastically worked on Java adapters, Shell scripting, GCP VMs. and many more. She has an obsession of finding efficient solution for every problem which is a big plus. She is a good team player as well, with a great positive energy!”
